ISSUE.TITLE: Optimize directory traversal by using filepath.WalkDir which avoids unnecessary sys calls.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: filepath.Walk calls os.Lstat for every file or directory to retrieve os.FileInfo. filepath.WalkDir avoids unnecessary system calls since it provides a fs.DirEntry, which includes file type information without requiring a stat call. So replace Walk with WalkDir This improves performance by reducing redundant system calls.
